holidays.title: World Diabetes Day
holidays.description: Diabetes is a chronic disease which leads to serious health conditions and, can be preventable.

holidays.title: Children's Day
holidays.description: Recognized across India to increase awareness of the rights, care, and education of children.

holidays.title: International Girls Day
holidays.description: Wear the cape of sisterhood to encourage and bring out the best in your girlfriends.

holidays.title: Loosen Up Lighten Up Day
holidays.description: When you take life seriously, you deserve a day to let go and just chill.

holidays.title: National American Teddy Bear Day
holidays.description: Cheers to our favorite bedside friend, the furry and ever-smiling Mr. Teddy Bear.

holidays.title: National Family PJ Day
holidays.description: The only sight more beautiful than a family is the one in matching P.Js.

holidays.title: National Marie Day
holidays.description: Shout out to the bearers of a versatile and wholly-accepted name today.

holidays.title: National Seat Belt Day
holidays.description: Set an example by belting up and being safe on the road.

holidays.title: National Spicy Guacamole Day
holidays.description: Grab a chip and prepare for some heat: there’s always a reason for spicy guac.

holidays.title: Operating Room Nurse Day
holidays.description: Raise your glasses to our angels in blue, the unspoken heroes of medicine.

holidays.title: Adina Howard’s Birthday
holidays.description: From making music to cooking delicious food, she does it all with passion!

holidays.title: Lil Boosie’s Birthday
holidays.description: Boosie BadAzz discovered his talent as a teenager and decided to pursue a music career.

holidays.title: Braden Baker’s Birthday
holidays.description: We're celebrating a boy like no other! Hes a blessing to this and future generations.

holidays.title: Brendan Morais’s Birthday
holidays.description: The family-oriented actor, Brendan Morais, is a complete package: charming, talented, and loving.

holidays.title: Chandler Powell’s Birthday
holidays.description: This skilled wakeboarder met the love of his life on the other side of the world.

holidays.title: Chip Gaines’s Birthday
holidays.description: Chip Gaines and his wife found fame through the HGTV hit show, ”Fixer Upper.”

holidays.title: Claude Monet’s Birthday
holidays.description: This French painter has left behind a legacy that lives on to this day.

holidays.title: Condoleezza Rice’s Birthday
holidays.description: This diplomat, politician, and academic has had a huge impact on contemporary American politics.

holidays.title: Don bbw’s Birthday
holidays.description: Don Bbw has a unique view of the world that leaves his followers hypnotized.

holidays.title: Francisco Lindor’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s no end to victorious wins in sight for this legendary Puerto Rican baseball player!

holidays.title: Frederick Banting’s Birthday
holidays.description: His curiosity got the best of him and made him one of Canada’s top medical scientists!

holidays.title: Gary Vaynerchuk’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's a jack of all trades, an author, a speaker, and an inspiring role model.

holidays.title: George Sear’s Birthday
holidays.description: Apart from being a great actor, what else does George Sear have up his sleeve?

holidays.title: Jawaharlal Nehru’s Birthday
holidays.description: Today, we honor a great leader, author, humanist, and all-around respectable man.

holidays.title: Jo Rivera’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality television star wasn’t popular when he first appeared on the screen.

holidays.title: Josh Duhamel’s Birthday
holidays.description: From college dropout to fashion magazines and big screens, Duhamel exemplifies the American dream.

holidays.title: Narwhal Dave’s Birthday
holidays.description: This gaming YouTuber entertained many before disappearing entirely.

holidays.title: Novi Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s not just a T.V. actress, but also a natural hair advocate!

holidays.title: Travis Barker’s Birthday
holidays.description: Barker has earned the reputation of being one of history's best drummers, and with good cause.
